hero.name: About Us
hero.title: With over 50 years of experience in Latin America
hero.subtitle: At Yobel, we drive your business with logistics and manufacturing solutions that integrate innovation, efficiency, and proximity, generating real value at every stage of the supply chain.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.content: Our purpose is to connect businesses with their customers through efficient and innovative logistics solutions.

purpose.title: Mission
purpose.content: Our mission is to provide world-class supply chain services that exceed our clients' expectations.

purpose.title: Vision
purpose.content: Our vision is to be the leading logistics partner in Latin America, recognized for our innovation and excellence.

values.title: Value Proposition
values.description: What makes us different in the market
